sentences.en: Brick masonry walls built with a technique known as reinforced grouted brick masonry performed excellently.
sentences.cn: 用新的施工技术砌筑的配筋灌浆砖墙表现良好.

sentences.en: Construction Technology for Masonry Arch Dams in Fujian and Economic Analysis.
sentences.cn: 福建砌石拱坝施工技术与经济分析.

sentences.en: Discussions on Some Problems in the Design of Masonry Structures.
sentences.cn: 在周期荷载作用下砖砌体基本性能的试验研究.

sentences.en: Experimental Study on Basic Behaviour of Brick Masonry under Reversed Loading.
sentences.cn: 砖结构抗震修复加固计算.

sentences.en: Heavy masonry infills start immediately above the commercial floor.
sentences.cn: 沉重的砌面填料马上压向商用楼层.

sentences.en: It was constructed on rock, using rubble masonry and stood about 48 ft . high.
sentences.cn: 它是一座建造在岩石上, 高约48英尺,由毛石砌成的石工建筑.
砖石工艺是一种精心的技艺.

sentences.en: Several people were buried under falling masonry.
sentences.cn: 好几个人被埋在倒塌的砖石下面。

sentences.en: She was hit by a piece of falling masonry.
sentences.cn: 她被建筑物上落下的一块石头砸着了.

sentences.en: She was injured by falling masonry.
sentences.cn: 她被倒塌的石墙砸伤了。

sentences.en: Study on the Reliability and Behaviour of Reinforcing Bond in Reinforced Masonry.
sentences.cn: 配筋砌块砌体中钢筋粘结性能与可靠性研究.

sentences.en: The Egyptian character of the masonry weighed upon me with its gloom.
sentences.cn: 那石头建筑具有埃及风格,阴森可怖,使我深感压抑.

sentences.en: The fall of masonry crushed the old man in the old house.
sentences.cn: 炉墙倒坍将那老人压倒在旧房屋里.

sentences.en: The masonry of the old building began to crumble.
sentences.cn: 旧楼房的砖石结构开始崩落.

sentences.en: Twenty people were injured by falling masonry.
sentences.cn: 有20人被倒塌的石墙砸伤。

sentences.en: Used for corundum bricks, mullite bricks, silicate bricks masonry in blast furnaces, hot air stoves.
sentences.cn: 用于高炉 、 热风炉砌筑刚玉砖、莫来石砖 、 硅线石砖 、 低蠕变高铝砖.

words.tran_cn: 石工；石工行业；[建]石造建筑

phrases.tran_cn: 砌体结构；砖石建筑物；石工结构

trans.tran_cn: 石工工程，砖瓦工工程，砖石建筑
trans.tran_en: the bricks or stone from which a building, wall etc has been made
